text: Richard Hamilton (December 31, 1920 - December 21, 2004) was an American movie, television, and stage actor who is known for his role as Agent D in Men in Black (1997). Hamilton was born on December 31, 1920 in Chicago, Illinois. He was married to Marilyn Morgan Hamilton until his death in 2004. Hamilton died on December 21, 2004 in New York City, New York from natural causes, he was 83 years old.*"Obituary: Richard Hamilton", The New York Times, January 5, 2005 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1920 births Category:2004 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Chicago
title: Richard Hamilton (actor)
